content.json:
# ðŸ“Š Azuria - Business Intelligence Workbook

AnÃ¡lise completa das mÃ©tricas de negÃ³cio, conversÃ£o e performance do Azuria.

---

content.query:
union 
(customEvents | where name == "pricing_calculation" | summarize Calculations = count()),
(customEvents | where name == "marketplace_analysis" | summarize Analyses = count()),
(customEvents | where name == "user_signup" | summarize Signups = count()),
(customEvents | where name == "subscription_upgrade" | summarize Upgrades = count()),
(pageViews | summarize PageViews = count()),
(pageViews | summarize UniqueUsers = dcount(user_Id))
| project Metric = case(
    isnotnull(Calculations), "ðŸ’° CÃ¡lculos de PreÃ§o",
    isnotnull(Analyses), "ðŸ“Š AnÃ¡lises de Marketplace", 
    isnotnull(Signups), "ðŸ‘¤ Novos Cadastros",
    isnotnull(Upgrades), "â­ Upgrades Premium",
    isnotnull(PageViews), "ðŸ“„ Page Views",
    isnotnull(UniqueUsers), "ðŸ‘¥ UsuÃ¡rios Ãšnicos",
    "Other"
), Value = coalesce(Calculations, Analyses, Signups, Upgrades, PageViews, UniqueUsers)
content.title: ðŸ“ˆ Resumo Executivo

content.query:
union 
(pageViews | where name contains "landing" | summarize Visitors = dcount(user_Id) | extend Step = "1. Visitantes", Order = 1),
(customEvents | where name == "user_signup" | summarize Signups = dcount(user_Id) | extend Step = "2. Cadastro", Order = 2),
(customEvents | where name == "feature_usage" | summarize ActiveUsers = dcount(user_Id) | extend Step = "3. Uso Ativo", Order = 3),
(customEvents | where name == "subscription_upgrade" | summarize Premium = dcount(user_Id) | extend Step = "4. Premium", Order = 4)
| project Step, Count = coalesce(Visitors, Signups, ActiveUsers, Premium), Order
| order by Order
| extend ConversionRate = case(
    Order == 1, 100.0,
    Order == 2, (Count * 100.0) / prev(Count),
    Order == 3, (Count * 100.0) / prev(Count, 2),
    Order == 4, (Count * 100.0) / prev(Count, 3),
    0.0
)
content.title: ðŸŽ¯ Funil de ConversÃ£o com Taxas

content.query:
customEvents
| where name == "pricing_calculation"
| extend 
    calculatorType = tostring(customDimensions.type),
    cost = todouble(customDimensions.cost),
    margin = todouble(customDimensions.margin),
    potentialRevenue = todouble(customDimensions.cost) * (todouble(customDimensions.margin) / 100)
| where isnotnull(cost) and isnotnull(margin)
| summarize 
    TotalCalculations = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(user_Id),
    AvgCost = round(avg(cost), 2),
    AvgMargin = round(avg(margin), 2),
    TotalRevenuePotential = round(sum(potentialRevenue), 2),
    AvgRevenuePerCalculation = round(avg(potentialRevenue), 2)
by calculatorType
| order by TotalRevenuePotential desc
content.title: ðŸ’¼ Revenue Potential por Calculadora

content.query:
customEvents
| where name == "marketplace_analysis"
| extend 
    marketplace = tostring(customDimensions.marketplace),
    products = toint(customDimensions.products_analyzed)
| summarize 
    TotalAnalyses = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(user_Id),
    AvgProducts = round(avg(products), 0),
    TotalProducts = sum(products)
by marketplace
| order by TotalAnalyses desc
| extend MarketShare = round((TotalAnalyses * 100.0) / toscalar(customEvents | where name == "marketplace_analysis" | summarize count()), 2)
content.title: ðŸ›’ Performance por Marketplace

content.query:
let signups = customEvents
    | where name == "user_signup"
    | extend CohortWeek = startofweek(timestamp)
    | summarize CohortSize = dcount(user_Id) by CohortWeek;
let activity = customEvents
    | where name == "feature_usage"
    | extend 
        SignupWeek = startofweek(timestamp),
        WeeksAfterSignup = (timestamp - startofweek(timestamp)) / 7d
    | summarize ActiveUsers = dcount(user_Id) by SignupWeek, WeeksAfterSignup;
signups
| join kind=inner activity on $left.CohortWeek == $right.SignupWeek
| extend RetentionRate = round((ActiveUsers * 100.0) / CohortSize, 2)
| project CohortWeek, WeeksAfterSignup, RetentionRate, CohortSize, ActiveUsers
| order by CohortWeek, WeeksAfterSignup
content.title: ðŸ“ˆ Taxa de RetenÃ§Ã£o por Cohort

content.query:
customEvents
| where name == "feature_usage"
| extend feature = tostring(customDimensions.feature)
| summarize 
    UsageCount = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(user_Id),
    AvgUsagePerUser = round(toreal(count()) / dcount(user_Id), 2)
by feature
| order by UsageCount desc
| take 15
| extend AdoptionRate = round((UniqueUsers * 100.0) / toscalar(pageViews | summarize dcount(user_Id)), 2)
content.title: ðŸŽ¯ Ranking de AdoÃ§Ã£o de Features

content.query:
union 
(pageViews | extend MetricType = "Page Views"),
(customEvents | where name == "user_signup" | extend MetricType = "Signups"),
(customEvents | where name == "pricing_calculation" | extend MetricType = "Calculations"),
(customEvents | where name == "subscription_upgrade" | extend MetricType = "Premium Upgrades")
| summarize Count = count() by MetricType, Day = bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by Day, MetricType
| serialize
| extend PreviousDayCount = prev(Count, 1)
| extend GrowthRate = case(
    PreviousDayCount > 0, round(((Count - PreviousDayCount) * 100.0) / PreviousDayCount, 2),
    0.0
)
| project Day, MetricType, Count, GrowthRate
content.title: ðŸ“ˆ Crescimento DiÃ¡rio de MÃ©tricas
